entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
